comment: Two player game . Write a c tweet collaboratively on a topic , alternating words . Player A s goal is to make the paragraph read as a serious , thoughtful take on the topic . Player B s goal is to make themselves look as good as possible . Play on DM and tweet result .
amr:
# ::snt Two player game . Write a c tweet collaboratively on a topic , alternating words . Player A s goal is to make the paragraph read as a serious , thoughtful take on the topic . Player B s goal is to make themselves look as good as possible . Play on DM and tweet result .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / game
            :quant 2
            :mod (p / person
                  :quant 2
                  :ARG0-of (p2 / play-01)))
      :snt2 (w / write-01
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :mod (v / variable
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "c")))
            :manner (c / collaborate-01)
            :topic (t2 / topic)
            :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01
                  :ARG2 (w2 / word
                        :ARG1-of (a / alternating-01))))
      :snt3 (g2 / goal
            :poss (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (p4 / play-01)
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "A")))
      :snt4 (g3 / goal
            :poss (p5 / person
                  :ARG0-of (p6 / play-01)
                  :mod (s2 / string-entity
                        :value "B"))
            :domain (m3 / make-02
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 (l / look-02
                        :ARG0 p5
                        :ARG1 (g4 / good-02
                              :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 p5
                                    :ARG3 (e / equal)
                                    :ARG4 (p7 / possible-01
                                          :ARG1 l))))))
      :snt5 (g5 / goal
            :poss p5
            :domain (m4 / make-02
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 l
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 g4
                  :ARG2-of h
                  :ARG1 p5
                  :ARG3 e)
            :ARG4 p7
            :ARG1 l))
